name: Nova Xonix 3D
description:
VixaGame proudly present remake of classic arcade game Xonix. Family of Xonix games known from middle of 80, but we go footer and add new dimension – meet Nova Xonix 3D! Modern 3D graphics in addition to classic, time proven gameplay will surely redefine your gaming experience.

 As a pilot of hi-tech flying device and you explore and capturing territory. Sounds simple, doesn't it? However, a lot of enemies await for you… You can also collect bonuses, some will help you, and some can do harm, so be careful.

Play Adnroid version of Nova Xonix https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.VixaGame.Xonix3D

Online version, WebGL https://www.vixagame.com/xonix/index.html
